ygData.subject: Re: Mez and stun
ygData.msgSnippet: I have noticed that also, about the Tashan line of spells, . I usually try to wait till the tanks get a few good hits in before I cast it, that seems to help.
ygData.messageBody:
I have noticed that also, about the Tashan line of spells, . I usually try
to wait till the tanks get a few good hits in before I cast it, that seems
to help.

Ayliala, 31 enchanter, Mith.Marr
----- Original Message -----
From: ADAM STEPNIEWSKI <Madastep@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, February 29, 2000 8:43 PM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Mez and stun


> From: "ADAM STEPNIEWSKI" <Madastep@...>
>
> Stun does not effect any of the Mez linbe of spells.... you may see the
> msg that they have been stunned but it doesn't break the entrall or dazzle
> or whatever... also stun only acts as a taunt do to the mobs who haven't
> bein personally attacked, meaning your puller may have brought 4 mobs
back
> but only hit one... so only one has any real aggro when you stun it ticks
> off the ones that don't have a specific aggro.
> Also i have a question, heh has anyone else noticed that if you are
the
> first to cast... (and no matter what you cast) tashan, tashani,
tashania...
> is seems the Mobs tend to like you alot... but only if i'm the first the
> cast.... (this is without any taunt type spells cast on it). has anyone
> else noticed this or am i dreamin? hehe
> One last this i really like this e-mail list it helps me get more info
> than anyother place due to real applications of things said... thanks guys
>
> Chantisis Tashania
> Rodcet Nife <Luna Imperium>
